name: Optic Maze
description:
This was another project from 2021 for the course Game Technology. This one can't really run in the browser since it's a 3D first-person game and the browser can't lock the cursor. Also, the game isn't set up to run at any other resolutions other than the one it expects.

You need to search the maze for two blue constructive geometry donuts, and then find the ramp they made to reach the exit.

There are two enemies to watch out for! Don't look at the Optical Enemy for too long, or you'll start being attacked. Keep an eye on the Freeze Enemy to keep them still. If the Freeze Enemy moves into you, you'll take damage.

Collecting coins doesn't do anything but make you happy.

Controls:

  • W - Forward
  • S - Backward
  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Close Eyes
  • Pause - Esc

If you don't like the controls, you can rebind them in the pause menu.

(I have no clue if the Linux or Mac builds work properly, I apologize if they don't. You can find the github repo here if you want to run it from Godot directly: https://github.com/Airtoum/05-FPS-Maze)
